Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
Are you ready? Ready to bring out your hidden power? As the first step, I will give you Skill Points so that you can acquire Ability Points with them.
(In this quest, you get skill points required to get the 1st Ability Point.Please switch to the class for which you want rewards before proceeding with the quest. If your character already has AP, you may be unable to acquire the 1 AP with the SP awarded.)
